description: STEAM lab is an educational platform that uses STEAM (science, technology, engineering, ART and math) games to engage and educate students. The platform also includes creation tools that allow teachers and content creators to turn their lessons into educational game challenges and stories. The main functional component of STEAM lab is STEAM increments, which are designed to enhance the educational experience.

openStandards:
we take the protection of our users' personal information very seriously. That's why we use industry-standard open standards to secure their data.

First
all data is encrypted while being sent to and from our servers using HTTPS. This ensures that no one can snoop on the communication

and that the data stays safe and private.

Second
we use JSON Web Tokens (JWT) to authenticate and authorize access to our API. This means that only authorized users can access the data

and it helps to protect the data from unauthorized access.

Third

we use the RS256 algorithm to sign JWT. This is a strong and secure way of making sure the JWT is authentic and can't be tampered with. It also allows us to verify the JWT using a public key.

We also take additional steps to ensure the security of our users' data
like regularly auditing and monitoring access to the data
and training our team on incident response. By taking these measures
we are confident that we are providing the highest level of data privacy and security for our users.

3-Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment (CI/CD): This project uses CI/CD to automate the build

4-Code reviews: This project uses code reviews to ensure that the code is of high quality and adheres to best practices.

5-User-centered design: This project focuses on user-centered design
which means that the design of the game education is based on user needs and feedback

making it more effective for its users.

6-Accessibility: This project also follows accessibility principles to ensure that the game education can be accessed and used by people with disabilities

7-Continuous learning: This project encourages continuous learning

by providing resources and opportunities for team members to improve their skills and knowledge.

8-Agile development : This project follows agile principles and practices
which allow for flexibility and adaptability in the development process
and encourages constant communication and collaboration among team members.

dataPrivacySecurity.dataPrivacySecurity:
At STEAMhub, we understand the importance of protecting our users' personal information. We have taken various measures to ensure the security of the data. To start with, we use encryption to safeguard the data both during transmission and storage. This means that even if someone unauthorized gains access to the data, they won't be able to read it without the encryption keys.

Additionally, we have implemented a strong access control system. This system uses user accounts and roles to ensure that only authorized individuals can access the data. We also keep an eye on access logs and investigate any suspicious activity. We comply with all relevant laws and regulations related to data privacy and security, like GDPR for the EU and HIPAA for the healthcare sector. We also conduct regular security audits to identify any vulnerabilities in the system and have a dedicated team to manage and mitigate risks.

Lastly, we practice data minimization, which means that we only collect the necessary data and delete data that is no longer needed. By taking these steps, we can confidently say that we provide the highest level of data privacy and security for our users.
